1. The τέχναι γραμματικαί on papyrus. - 2. The pronominal forms in the school book Brit. Mus. Add. MS. 37533 [= P. Lond. Inv. Add. Ms. 37533] (= Pack2 2712) and in Dionysius's Techne.
